improved_response: I'm sorry to hear that â€” running out of food before the end of the month can be really stressful. How often does that tend to happen? And is that something you're dealing with right now?
changes_made: Replaced the cold 'Okay.' opener with an empathetic acknowledgment that validates the difficulty of the user's situation.
